scripts.start: cd packages/radix-vue && pnpm i && pnpm run build && cd ../../playground/vue3 && pnpm i && pnpm i ../../packages/radix-vue && pnpm run dev
scripts.start-nuxt: cd packages/radix-vue && pnpm i && pnpm run build && cd ../../playground/nuxt && pnpm i && pnpm i ../../packages/radix-vue && pnpm run dev
